decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - 1/  The proposed house, would, by reason of its size, appearance and position, represent an  infill development on a prominent corner site detrimental to the appearance and residential amenity of the adjoining properties and local area.  The proposal is contrary to the Policies ENV 1.1 (All New Development) and H3.4 (Extensions and Alterations) of the Unitary Development Plan and ENVB 1.1 (New Development)   and H.6.4 Extensions and Alterations) of the Revised Deposit Unitary Development Plan.  

2/ The proposal  fails to provide sufficient on site car parking and is likely to give 
rise to conditions which are prejudicial to the free flow of traffic and highway 
safety  The proposal is therefore contrary to policy T 2.5 (Parking and Servicing 
Facilities of the Unitary Development Plan and policy T 1.4 ( Car and Cycle 
Parking and Servicing Facilities) of the Revised Deposit Unitary Development 
Plan.
description: Erection of a three bedroomed etached dwellinghouse to site
